name: FireBrawl
description:
Welcome to FireBrawl.

In this game your goal is to make fire, the oldest technology that we know of.

Battle against your friend or AI!

---

This is my second LD entry, and the first Jam!

Our Team:

bigpan(programming and a bit of design)

@kaduwall(design and sound)

fdbarichello(my beautiful girlfriend and design xD )

We haad soo much trouble with this game, sorry if you encounter major game breaking bugs, we did not have much time to test it!
